backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, file metadata, transfer records, and AI processing results with access-control‐protected CRUD operations and blob storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing app structure, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions implementing light and dark color schemes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the main React app and including metadata, manifest, and icon links.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline fallback, and asset versioning for the PWA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, offline mode, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/AIFeatures.tsx: UI for image compression and file recognition with upload, processing, progress tracking, and backend recording.
frontend/src/components/DashboardDownloa: Dashboard tab displaying received file downloads from transfer history with loading state.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSentTab: Loads transfer history, filters sent files for the current user, and displays them or a loading spinner.
frontend/src/components/FileTransfer.tsx: Handles file selection, drag-and-drop, receiver selection, upload flow, and recording transfers with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer showing the app name and year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows the login UI with Internet Identity authentication and optional offline mode entry.
frontend/src/components/OfflineFileShare: Provides offline export/import of packaged files and saving extracted files to the device.
frontend/src/components/OnlineUsers.tsx: Lists online users excluding the current user, showing profiles and online status with loading handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Allows new users to enter and save a display name to complete their profile.
frontend/src/components/ReceivedDownload: Lists received files with metadata and allows downloading while showing loading and toast states.
frontend/src/components/RecentlyReceived: Fetches recent transfer history, filters received files, and displays up to five with download support.
frontend/src/components/SentDownloadsLis: Shows files the user has sent and lets them re-download each with loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Dialog for editing and updating user profile fields like display name and avatar URL.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDownload: Loads received transfers and displays them in a scrollable list within settings.
Displays full transfer history with status, metadata, and file download actions.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports static app branding values such as name and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including creating AuthClient, loading stored identities, and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, online status, and related backend interactions using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing file transfer features, online users, notifications, and tabbed UI for transfers and AI features.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineDashboard.tsx: Offline mode dashboard enabling local file sharing and explaining offline package workflow.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load to enable offline support.
Utility to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and save the resulting file to the device with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/offlineSharePackage.t: Creates and imports self-contained HTML offline share packages embedding file data in base64.
frontend/src/utils/qrPayload.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/receivedDownloads.ts: Provides helpers to detect installable file types, format sizes and timestamps, and filter transfer records for sent or received files by the current user.
frontend/src/utils/saveToDevice.ts: Implements file saving using the File System Access API with a fallback to creating a downloadable link.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/useOnlineStatus.ts: React hook that tracks the browser’s online/offline status via window events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, radii, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container-queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, versioning, and a detailed list of implemented features for the OFS web application.
